messages.message: In .ibdoc, there’s a field called `absolute_ibocr_path` at the record level. Does anyone know how/when this is used?
Yes, it is used to point to the ibdoc right after process files so that we can go back and retrieve additional information such as text, layout etc. which is required in the review UI
I use it also on the front end to create ibdoc records from ibocr files in the update OCR app.
i believe in the old review ocr app this is the path it reads to render the image / text viewer. it’s always pointing to the s1 process file output
